thread.title: BRIEF-Crowell Development to issue 45 mln new shares for engineering construction

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Crowell Development to issue 45 mln new shares for engineering construction
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Crowell Development Corp :
* Says it plans to issue 45 million new shares with par value of T$10 per share and tentative issue price at T$13 per share for engineering construction
* Says 10 percent of the new shares will be offered to the companyâ€™s employees, 10 percent shares will be offered via public offering, remaining 80 percent will be offered to the existing shareholders
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/GUAMrd
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
